entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as the main character who visits Lockhart's office. He is described as a 'scallywag' by Lockhart ("Ah, here’s the scallywag!‘ he said).

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart is introduced as the teacher who has many photographs of himself in his office. He is described as beaming down at Harry and talking about fame and celebrity.

entities.name: gladys gudgeon
entities.description: Gladys Gudgeon is mentioned by Lockhart as a huge fan of his who will receive one of the signed photographs.

relationships.description: Harry visits Lockhart's office, where he is greeted by Lockhart and asked to address envelopes with signed photographs.
Lockhart mentions that Gladys Gudgeon is a huge fan of his, indicating a relationship between Lockhart and Gladys Gudgeon.
